Wireless Charging: Integrating wireless charging technology into the mouse to eliminate the need for cords and reduce clutter on the desk.
Customizable Buttons: Adding additional buttons to the mouse that can be programmed to perform specific functions, such as opening frequently used files or executing macros.
Adjustable Sensitivity: Allowing users to adjust the sensitivity of the mouse to their preference, whether they prefer a faster or slower cursor speed.
Noise Cancellation: Incorporating noise-cancelling technology into the mouse to reduce background noise and improve focus while using the computer.
Gesture Control: Adding gesture control features to the mouse, such as the ability to swipe or scroll with the hand, to improve efficiency and reduce the need for button clicks.
